accessAppName.description: Name of Office Access application displayed if it is not installed

cancel.description: Cancel label (eg. used in some buttons)

close.description: Close label (eg. used in some buttons)

create.description: Create label (eg. used in some buttons)

createOfficeFileDialogTitle.description: Dialog title for the Create new Office file feature

description.description: Extension description displayed in extension management UI and the Chrome Web Store

dialogNotesTitle.description: Title of the notes section that can be defined in a dialog

enableUfoDialogInstructions.description: Dialog text displayed to explain to the user how to enable the UFO extension when it is disabled
enableUfoDialogInstructions.message:
To enable it, open your extensions management page and tick the Enable checkbox next to the UFO extension.
Once done, you will be able to open your file.

enableUfoDialogIntro.description: Dialog text displayed to explain to the user how to enable the UFO extension when it is disabled
enableUfoDialogIntro.message: We have detected that the Universal File Opener (UFO) extension, necessary to open this type of file, is installed but disabled in your Google Chrome browser.

enableUfoDialogTitle.description: Dialog title displayed to invite the user to enable the UFO extension

excelAppName.description: Name of Office Excel application displayed if it is not installed

excelDialogFileNameInputPlaceholder.description: Dialog input placeholder for the Create Excel document feature

extensionChanged.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when the extension is updated, disabled or uninstalled
extensionChanged.message: The AwesomeDrive extension has been updated or uninstalled. A page reload is required to apply changes

gridViewError.description: Error message displayed on the Drive UI if Grid view is used to display Drive pages
gridViewError.message: $extensionName$ - Grid view not supported, please switch to List view

installUfoDialogAgreeButton.description: Label of the button to install the UFO extension

installUfoDialogDisagreeButton.description: Label of the button to not use UFO this time

installUfoDialogFeatureList.description: Dialog text displayed to list the features provided by UFO
installUfoDialogFeatureList.message:
Good news! Extend the Awesome Drive scope by installing our Universal File Opener (UFO) extension to:
  • Open any type of file from Google Drive with your local software,
  • Save the changes you made locally on your computer directly to Google Drive

installUfoDialogImprovementList.description: Dialog text displayed to list the improvements provided by UFO
installUfoDialogImprovementList.message:
UFO also improves files edition within Google Drive by:
  • Removing the 32MB file size limitation,
  • Supporting old Microsoft Office versions (prior to Office 2013)

installUfoDialogIntro.description: Dialog text displayed to introduce the UFO extension to the user
installUfoDialogIntro.message: You want to open other file types than Microsoft Office?

installUfoDialogLearnMore.description: Dialog link to redirect the user to the knowledge base to get more info on UFO

installUfoDialogNeverButton.description: Label of the button to exclude current account from using UFO
installUfoDialogNeverButton.message: Don't ask me again for this account

installUfoDialogPricing.description: Dialog text displayed to inform that UFO is free of charge for the beta but will become a paying option in the future
installUfoDialogPricing.message: UFO is currently available free of charge as a public beta version. At the end of the beta period, Awesome Drive users will have the option to purchase the UFO feature for a monthly fee.

installUfoDialogQuestion.description: Dialog question displayed to ask the user if he wants to install UFO
installUfoDialogQuestion.message: Do you want to install the UFO extension?

installUfoDialogTitle.description: Dialog title displayed to invite the user to install the UFO extension

installUfoDialogTooltip.description: Tooltip displayed in the install UFO dialog when hovering the Never for this account button
installUfoDialogTooltip.message: If you change your mind, use the "Install UFO" link available by clicking on the extension icon right to the browser address bar

name.description: Extension name displayed in install dialog, extension management UI, and the Chrome Web Store

newExcelMenuItem.description: Label of the New Excel document menu item

newFileFailed.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when file creation in Drive failed
newFileFailed.message: Failed to create new file in Drive

newFileInProgress.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when file creation in AODocs is launched

newOfficeDocFailed.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when a Office doc creation failed

newOfficeDocInProgress.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when Office file creation is launched

newOfficeDocSuccess.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI when an Office file is successfully created
newOfficeDocSuccess.message: Document "$docName$" successfully created, it will appear in your folder soon

newOfficeDocSuccessWebdav.description: Message displayed on the Drive UI before trying to automatically open a newly created Office file
newOfficeDocSuccessWebdav.message: Document "$docName$" successfully created, it should open in Microsoft $officeSoftware$ soon

newPowerpointMenuItem.description: Label of the New Powerpoint document menu item

newWordMenuItem.description: Label of the New Word document menu item

oauthFailureDetail.description: Chrome notification content displayed if user rejects requested permissions
oauthFailureDetail.message: AwesomeDrive is not authorized, reload your Google Drive page to redisplay the authorization page.

oauthFailureTitle.description: Chrome notification title displayed if user rejects requested permissions

oauthSuccessDetail.description: Chrome notification content displayed if user accepts requested permissions
oauthSuccessDetail.message: AwesomeDrive is now authorized to be displayed in your Google Drive pages.

oauthSuccessTitle.description: Chrome notification title displayed if user accepts requested permissions

ok.description: OK label (eg. used in some buttons)

openFileTooltip.description: Tooltip value for the open file button

pageActionTitle.description: The page-action popup title displayed when the page-action icon is hovered in the address bar

popupCloseSettings.description: Label of the close icon displayed in the top right corner of the page-action popup

popupDisabledFeature.description: Title message displayed when hovering a disabled feature in the page action popup
popupDisabledFeature.message: This feature is disabled in your settings

popupErrDOM.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if a DOM check failed
popupErrDOM.message: Drive page structure seems invalid. This feature will be unavailable.

popupErrExtensionConflict.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if an incompatible extension is active
popupErrExtensionConflict.message: This extension is disabled because it has detected another AODocs extension. If you want to use it, disable the AODocs extension $extensionName$ first.

popupErrGridView.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if Grid view is used to display Drive pages
popupErrGridView.message: Grid view not supported, please switch to List view

popupErrNoUser.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if current user retrieval failed
popupErrNoUser.message:
Failed to identify current user.
Please try the following:
  • Reload your page
  • Get help from the community

popupErrNotAuthorize.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if OAuth token is missing
popupErrNotAuthorize.message:
Missing required permissions for AwesomeDrive initialization.
Reopen permissions page

popupErrUnexpected.description: Error message displayed in the page-action popup if init unexpectedly failed
popupErrUnexpected.message: An unexpected error occurred during AwesomeDrive initialization. We apologize for the inconvenience.

popupGetHelp.description: Link in the footer of the status page to the google plus community

popupInitializing.description: Message displayed in the page-action popup while waiting for the user to accept authorizations
popupInitializing.message:
Waiting for authorization...
Reopen permissions page

popupInstallUfo.description: Link in the footer of the status page to install the UFO extension

popupNewOfficeFile.description: Label of the New item feature displayed in the page-action popup

popupNotInitialized.description: Message displayed in page-action popup before initialization starts
popupNotInitialized.message:
AwesomeDrive initialization not yet started.
Please wait a moment or try to reload your Drive page.

popupOpenFile.description: Label of the Open files feature displayed in the page-action popup

popupPrevious.description: Label of the link displayed in the footer of the page-action popup to go to previous page

popupReload.description: Label of the Reload action displayed in the page-action popup

popupSaveSettingsFail.description: Message displayed in the settings popup / page when saving changes failed

popupSettings.description: Label of the settings section displayed in the page-action popup

popupStatus.description: Label of the status section displayed in the page-action popup

popupWarnDOM.description: Warning message displayed in the page-action popup if DOM check failed for a feature
popupWarnDOM.message: Drive page structure seems invalid. This feature might be unavailable.

popupWelcomeTour.description: Label of the link displayed in the footer of the page-action popup to show the Welcome tour

powerpointAppName.description: Name of Office Powerpoint application displayed if it is not installed

powerpointDialogFileNameInputPlaceholder.description: Dialog input placeholder for the Create Powerpoint document feature

shortName.description: Extension short name (maximum of 12 characters recommended)

visioAppName.description: Name of Office Visio application displayed if it is not installed

webDavExernalNoEditRights.description: Error message displayed when the user try to open an external file with Webdav without edit permission
webDavExernalNoEditRights.message: You are not authorized to edit this file, opening in read only mode...

webDavExternalFailedQuota.description: Error message displayed when the user have reached the daily quota for Webdav use for external file
webDavExternalFailedQuota.message: Failed to open, you have reached the daily quota for editing non AODocs MS Office files

webDavExternalSizeWarning.description: Warning message displayed when the user opens a big external file with Webdav
webDavExternalSizeWarning.message: Large file edition. If too much content is added you won't be able to save it (max size: 32MB)

webDavFailed.description: Error message displayed on the Drive UI when Open in Office failed when retriving WebDav url
webDavFailed.message: Failed to open. Unable to retrieve the Office file url

webDavFailedTooLarge.description: Error message displayed on the Drive UI when an Office file exceeded the max size for the WebDav feature
webDavFailedTooLarge.message: Failed to open, the file is too large (> 32MB). Please perform a regular download / upload to edit the file

webDavFailedUnauthorized.description: Error message displayed on the Drive UI when the user try to retrieve the Webdav document url without edit permission
webDavFailedUnauthorized.message: You are not authorized to edit this file

webDavUnsupportedOS.description: Error message displayed during initialize if user OS is not supported for outd
webDavUnsupportedOS.message: Your Operating System is not supported. See the supported OS.

webdavMalformedName.description: Error message displayed on the Drive UI when an Office file name is malformed (no extension, suffix after extension...)
webdavMalformedName.message: Failed to open, the file name is not valid. Check that it ends with a valid MS Office extension

webdavOpened.description: Message displayed when a document is opened with Webdav feature
webdavOpened.message: Your file should be opening. If not, please verify you have a supported version of Microsoft Office installed

welcomeCreateOfficeText.description: Text of the 'createOffice' step of the 'welcome' feature tour
welcomeCreateOfficeText.message: Open the Google Drive “NEW” menu and create a new Word, Excel or PowerPoint document in one click.

welcomeCreateOfficeTitle.description: Title of the 'createOffice' step of the 'welcome' feature tour

welcomeOpenFileText.description: Text of the 'openFile' step of the 'welcome' feature tour
welcomeOpenFileText.message: No need to manually download and upload your Drive files anymore. Just click, edit and save!

welcomeOpenFileTitle.description: Title of the 'openFile' step of the 'welcome' feature tour

welcomePageActionText.description: Text of the 'pageAction' step of the 'welcome' feature tour
welcomePageActionText.message: Click on the AwesomeDrive icon to get status information and useful links.

welcomePageActionTitle.description: Title of the 'pageAction' step of the 'welcome' feature tour

welcomeWelcomeText.description: Text of the 'welcome' step of the 'welcome' feature tour
welcomeWelcomeText.message: Check out the next pages to discover the features added by AwesomeDrive to your Google Drive!

welcomeWelcomeTitle.description: Title of the 'welcome' step of the 'welcome' feature tour

wordAppName.description: Name of Office Word application displayed if it is not installed

wordDialogFileNameInputPlaceholder.description: Dialog input placeholder for the Create Word document feature
